The Mortal Storm

Ano: 1940

IMDb ID: tt0032811

Classificação: 7.7

Sinopse: Interesting to note that the film was made in 1940, one year before America's entry into the European war against Hitler. The movie depicts Germany in 1933. In 1938 the 'night of broken glass' took place and the attitudes portrayed in the film are definitely anti-Nazi.—Matt Goodwin
